bug.author: jvdavim
bug.description:
The current sample number on the top left corner of the labeling page is not updating. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16657663/97609755-c2729000-19f2-11eb-8011-b42cdcc901f1.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16657663/97609779-c9010780-19f2-11eb-8e2b-c1364736df08.png></denchmark-link>
Probably a 0.14 bug.

comments.comment: Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvdavim>@jvdavim</denchmark-link> ! Perfect timing, we're doing a bunch of development today in the hackathon :)
